summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the Choi quantum channel representation in Qiskit, covering its construction, arithmetic, composition, tensor products, transposition, adjoint, conjugation, equality checks, CPTP verification, and proper error handling.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Choi channel implementation for developers and researchers working with quantum information processing in Qiskit, thereby supporting reliable simulation and analysis of quantum channels.
